title: Manager: Nutrition Bar (FWS Eligible) Student Worker III
duties_responsibilities: Oversee daily scheduled operation of Nutrition Bar
Prepare, serve, and store food in accordance with regulations
Operate and maintain kitchen utensils and equipment
Maintain records such as inventory and equipment maintenance
Clean and sanitize work stations and equipment
required_qualifications: Significant amount of specialized training or experience
Valid card or certificate from an ANSI-accredited food handler training program
